name: Busking Backwards To Borgarfjordur
description:
You are a drummer on tour in Iceland with Bari the Baritone who is Busking Backwards To Borgarfjordur. He's facing backwards because he doesn't know any Icelandic and he needs you to whisper the correct Icelandic lyrics to him, all while avoiding volcanic rocks! When an Icelandic word pops up on the screen, you only have a few seconds to use the keyboard keys to type in the word correctly before the timer runs out.

Controls:
Keyboard to type in the Icelandic word when it pops up on the top of the screen.
Left and Right Arrows to move Bari the Baritone to avoid the volcanic rocks.

Created by Randolph Espejo of Miroir Industries.
Additional voices provided by Jenny K. Dean.
